#summary Configuring Lighttpd to run ZDWebStats

= Installation =

Grab the ZDWebStats bundle from svn (svn checkout http://zdstack.googlecode.com/svn/zdwebstats)

= Configuration =

  * /var/www
    * /zdwebstats
      * /templates
      * /ZDStats
      * /static
        * /js
        * /styles

= Lighttpd Configuration File =

{{{
fastcgi.server = (
  "/servers" => (( "socket" => "/tmp/fastcgi.socket",
                   "bin-path" => "/var/www/zdstats/zdstats.py",
                   "max-procs" => 1,
                   "bin-environment" => ( "REAL_SCRIPT_NAME" => "" ),
                   "check-local" => "disable"
                )))

url.rewrite-once = (
  "^/favicon.ico$" => "/static/favicon.ico",
  "^/static/(.*)$" => "/$1",
  "^/servers/(.*)$" => "/servers/$1"
)

}}}

= zdstats.ini =
{{{
[DEFAULT]
zdstack_address = http://blah.blah.blah.blah:port
zdstack_protocol = xmlrpc
zdstack_username = admin
zdstack_password = pacman2000
template_dir = /var/www/zdstats/templates
title = Servers on Greatest Servers
heading = Greatest Servers
}}}
